name: September '39
description:
Defend Poland from German invasion in a turn-based strategy game

Before you play, do the tutorial!

A strategy game by:

  • JulianDK - Code
  • cryptic_ - Code
  • Ziuk - Art, Music, SFX

This game was made for the Historical Accurate Game Jam 5

Some part of the game had to be censored because of the controversy surrounding it.
